body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**: /kind bug

**What happened**:
The deploy & rs result of the kubectl get all result are repeatedly displayed.
And inquire for them alone (kubectl get deploy & kubectl get rs), the result is correct.

```
[root@controller:/]$ kubectl get deploy --all-namespaces
NAMESPACE     NAME                   DESIRED   CURRENT   UP-TO-DATE   AVAILABLE   AGE
kube-system   kube-dns               1         1         1            1           1d
kube-system   kubernetes-dashboard   1         1         1            1           1d
[root@controller:/]$ kubectl get rs --all-namespaces
NAMESPACE     NAME                              DESIRED   CURRENT   READY     AGE
kube-system   kube-dns-778977457c               1         1         1         1d
kube-system   kubernetes-dashboard-676975d47f   1         1         1         1d
[root@controller:/]$ kubectl get all --all-namespaces
NAMESPACE     NAME                          DESIRED   CURRENT   UP-TO-DATE   AVAILABLE   AGE
kube-system   deploy/kube-dns               1         1         1            1           1d
kube-system   deploy/kubernetes-dashboard   1         1         1            1           1d

NAMESPACE     NAME                                 DESIRED   CURRENT   READY     AGE
kube-system   rs/kube-dns-778977457c               1         1         1         1d
kube-system   rs/kubernetes-dashboard-676975d47f   1         1         1         1d

NAMESPACE     NAME                          DESIRED   CURRENT   UP-TO-DATE   AVAILABLE   AGE
kube-system   deploy/kube-dns               1         1         1            1           1d
kube-system   deploy/kubernetes-dashboard   1         1         1            1           1d

NAMESPACE     NAME                                 DESIRED   CURRENT   READY     AGE
kube-system   rs/kube-dns-778977457c               1         1         1         1d
kube-system   rs/kubernetes-dashboard-676975d47f   1         1         1         1d

NAMESPACE     NAME                                       READY     STATUS    RESTARTS   AGE
default       po/proman                                  1/1       Running   0          2h
kube-system   po/kube-dns-778977457c-wc7ff               3/3       Running   0          1d
kube-system   po/kubernetes-dashboard-676975d47f-hdvkr   1/1       Running   0          1d

NAMESPACE     NAME                       TYPE        CLUSTER-IP      EXTERNAL-IP   PORT(S)         AGE
default       svc/kubernetes             ClusterIP   10.254.0.1      <none>        443/TCP         2d
kube-system   svc/kube-dns               ClusterIP   10.254.0.10     <none>        53/UDP,53/TCP   1d
kube-system   svc/kubernetes-dashboard   NodePort    10.254.87.150   <none>        80:31749/TCP    1d
[root@controller:/]$
```


**What you expected to happen**:
Run kubectl get all, the deploy & rs result show correctly.


**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
[root@controller:/]$ kubectl version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"8", GitVersion:"v1.8.4", GitCommit:"9befc2b8928a9426501d3bf62f72849d5cbcd5a3", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-11-20T05:28:34Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"8", GitVersion:"v1.8.4", GitCommit:"9befc2b8928a9426501d3bf62f72849d5cbcd5a3", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-11-20T05:17:43Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): 
CentOS 7.3
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
```
[root@controller:/]$ uname -a
Linux controller 3.10.0-514.26.2.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Jul 18 11:25:45 CST 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG CLI.
labels.name: sig/cli

title: [v1.8.4] The deploy & rs result of "kubectl get all" are repeatedly displayed.
